title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description:
Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI.

Somehow, I don't think it's supposed to do that. Then clicking on other buttons also makes the bell sound.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, it makes a beeping sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also produces the same bell sound.
EB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, it should not make a beeping sound. Clicking on other buttons should not produce the bell sound either.
SR:
1. Open ControlExampleText.
2. Select the option SWT.MULTI.
3. Observe the beeping sound.
4. Click on other buttons.
5. Observe that the bell sound is produced again.
